item.title: Like doing visualisations with OSM? Showcase your project or map at the State of the Map 2024! Options include: how well your home region is mapped; a beautiful new style or map; a community project or statistic; an explanation or invitation to use OpenStreetMap--just to name a few. What is important is that we want it to be about OSM. We also welcome academic posters about research around OSM data. https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/07/08/sotm-2024-call-for-posters/
📣 Deadline Extended! The early bird deadline for the 2024 #SotM in Nairobi, Kenya on September 6-8 has been extended to July 31. Register today!

Are you ready to celebrate TWENTY years of mapping? Join us 09Aug2024 for OSM's global 20th birthday celebration. - Share the date/time/coordinates of your event - Sign the OSM 20th birthday card - Share photos & map viz with #20YearsofOSM https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ Are you ready to celebrate TWENTY years of mapping? Join us 09Aug2024 for the #OpenStreetMap global 20th birthday celebration. - Share the date/time/coordinates of your event - Sign the OSM 20th birthday card - Share photos & map viz with #20YearsofOSM https://birthday20.openstreetmap.org/ image caption: Feye Andal shows of a cake during a get-togeher in Manila, celebrating the 18th OpenStreetMap anniversary

> For a vibrant consumer navigational ecosystem to emerge, society needs to invest in OpenStreetMap as a public good. … City planners should dedicate staffers to updating their roads and bridges on OpenStreetMap. Communities should submit updates with roads and hazards in their local areas We quite agree! 😍 From @Julia's recent Op. Ed. in the #NewYorkTimes, “Your Driving App Is Leading You Astray” 📰 read here: https://www.nytimes.com/2024/07/10/opinion/google-maps-driving-apps-flaws.html?unlocked_article_code=1.6E0.yGok.7gErcSBb7E43&smid=url-share #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #FreeMaps

The #SotM working group has announced updates regarding the programme and tickets for the 2024 @sotm in Nairobi, Kenya. Early bird registration deadline: 31 July 2024 at 23:59 UTC. More information: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/07/08/participating-in-sotm-2024-programme-and-tickets/

Looking for some fun? 😊 Several games have already been built using OpenStreetMap data, enabling the creation of games set in the real world. 🎮 📝https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Games #OpenStreetMap #OSM

📍 State of the Map Europe 2024 Conference 🗺️ Lodz, Poland | 📅 July 18-21, 2024 It's just a few days away! Don’t miss out – you can still sign up: https://stateofthemap.eu/ #SOTMEU2024 #Mapping #OpenStreetMap Heavily discounted tickets are available for active mappers, see https://openstreetmap.org.pl/2024/sotm-eu-2024-community-tickets-70/

🇺🇸📬 “Neither snow nor rain nor heat nor gloom of night…” will stop the United States Postal Service from using OpenStreetMap for their “Find USPS Locations” website! 😍 📬🇺🇸 👍 https://tools.usps.com/locations/ (search for a US location (e.g. 90210) to see the map) #OSM #OpenStreetMap #USPS #PostalService #UnitedStatesPostalService

The OpenStreetMap Foundation Annual General Meeting will be on 19th Oct. 2024! There are 4 seats available on the OSMF Board of Directors, and you can nominate yourself in about a month! Why not think about it? read more: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/06/26/osm-foundation-board-election-2024-how-to-become-a-board-candidate/ OSM Wiki Page: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/AGM2024/Election_to_Board #OSM #OpenStreetMap #OSMFoundation #OSMF

Tickets for the 2024 #StateoftheMap in Nairobi, Kenya on Sept 6-8 are up! Whether you're attending in-person or online, you'll want to grab your early bird ticket by end of the month to save up! 🎟️ https://2024.stateofthemap.org/tickets/ #openstreetmap #sotm2024 #stateofthemap2024 @OSMKenya @osmafrica @osmasia Logo: Paul H. Bushoki Background: Amani Nation (Unsplash)

OpenStreetMap is powered by thousands of volunteers. But a special thanks to the Data Working Group volunteers, who have done excellent work at countering the recent wave of vandalism in OSM. 👏👏👏 https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/praise-of-the-data-working-group/115066 #OpenStreetMap #OSM

AddisMapTransit has mapped over 2,300 public transport stops and 443 routes in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia 🇪🇹 . These routes were then converted from OSM to standardised open transport data (GTFS) and submitted to the DigitalTransport4Africa repository. ( 🙏 @weeklyOSM for the write-up) https://www.trufi-association.org/addismaptransit-submits-transport-routes-to-dt4a/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #PublicTransport #Ethiopia

SotMAsia and SotM Bangladesh are looking for enthusiastic Campus Ambassadors to help make the event a grand success. Read more at Shawan Shariar's diary https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/Sawan%20Shariar/diary/404290 #OpenStreetMap #OSM #SotMAsia @sotmasia

OpenStreetMap is a map that everyone can edit and improve, and that's how we've created the best map of the world. 😍 🗺 💪 🥇 Alas, some people just want to vandalise things 😭. If you've seen weird things on the map (e.g. lots of crossing white lines), that could be vandalism. Here's what to do if you see this: https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/have-you-spotted-vandalism-on-openstreetmap-org/114684 with thanks to @SomeoneElse. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMVandalism #Vandalism

OSMF at the UN Maps conference! OpenStreetMap Foundation board member Sarah Hoffmann recently joined the 3rd annual UNMaps conference in Valencia, Spain to present about the OpenStreetMap project and participate in a panel discussion about crowd-sourced geodata. read more: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/06/18/openstreetmap-at-the-unmaps-conference-2024/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #UN "Crowdsourcing Geospatial Information" | Panelists from left to right: (host) Michael Montani (UNMappers; (panelists) Benjamin Herfort (HeiGIT), Sarah Hoffmann (OSMF), Sam Colchester (HOT).

Looking to get in touch with other #LGBTQ+ #OpenStreetMap people? Have you heard of MapBeks <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/MapBeks> or RainbOSM <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/RainbOSM> @rainbosm? Happy Pride 🏳️‍🌈 and Happy Mapping 🗺! #OpenStreetMap #OSM #Pride #PrideMonth #PrideMonth2024

The main way to store #LGBTQ+ aspect in #OpenStreetMap is with the `lgbtq` tag. 🏳️‍🌈 `lgbtq=primary` is for locations which cater to an exclusively or predominantly LGBTQ+ audience, either by the managers running it that way, or by overwhelming convention. Subtags (`lgbtq:*=*`) can be used for finer details. Read more on the OSM Wiki 📝 <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:lgbtq> Happy Pride 🏳️‍🌈 and Happy Mapping! 🗺 🙂 #OSM #LGB #LGBT #LGBTQ #PrideMonth #Pride #PrideMonth2024

Today (3 June) is #WorldBicycleDay! 🚲🚲 #OpenStreetMap has always had lots of cycling enthusiasts, mappers, cartographers and devs! 🚲 JFK said “Nothing compares to the simple pleasure of riding a bike”, we agree but would include “or OSM mapping”. 🙂🚲🗺️🔎 2 #bicycle maps are visible on OSM.org: OpenCycleMap <https://osm.org/#layers=C> and CyclOSM <https://osm.org/#layers=Y> To find out how to map #bike features, check out the #OSM wiki: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Bicycle>

What's some of your favourite photos or images of #OpenStreetMap from the last 20 years? 🙂🤔📸 Help the OSM CWG collect images for the OSM's 20th Birthday party. 🙂🙂 suggest your favorites on the OSM forum: 💬 https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/favorite-photos-and-quotes-about-osm-over-the-last-20-years/113968 NB: Interesting, CC licenced, images can be uploaded to the OSM wiki: 📝 <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org>! #OpenStreetMap #OSM

🏳️‍🌈 Happy Pride from OpenStreetMap! 🙂 🏳️‍🌈 LGBTQ+ people are mappers, and hackers, and cartographers, and have always been a part of the OpenStreetMap community. A diverse community where people treat each other with respect has more potential contributors and more sources for ideas, and will create a better map. https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/w/images/thumb/b/ba/2019_v1_OSM_Rainbow.svg/768px-2019_v1_OSM_Rainbow.svg.png #Pride #LGBTQ #LGBTQ+ #Queer #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat
